ch0176_00_goyo/0101_0701_01_10:
Ah, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. You timed your
arrival well. I’ve just finished reading a book,
you see.
ch0176_00_goyo/0101_0701_02_10:
Both books and people are different each time you
encounter them. Let’s hope for some more
wonderful encounters today.
ch0176_00_goyo/7101_0701_01_10:
In the Sinnoh region, we have a large library in a
place called Canalave City.
ch0176_00_goyo/7101_0701_02_10:
It has many valuable historical books, and you can
easily spend a whole day in there without
getting bored.
ch0176_00_goyo/7101_0701_03_10: Why don’t you try visiting if you’re ever in Sinnoh?
ch0176_00_goyo/7102_0701_01_10:
The thoughts written down in a book transcend
both time and space.
ch0176_00_goyo/7102_0701_02_10:
As I read, I often imagine what people in the
Sinnoh region of old were thinking.
ch0176_00_goyo/7102_0701_03_10:
Hmm... Perhaps this is the influence of our history-
loving Champion.
ch0176_00_goyo/7103_0701_01_10:
Do the Poryphones on Pasio have an app for
reading books?
ch0176_00_goyo/7103_0701_02_10:
I could certainly make good use of my time if I
could read at any time or place.
ch0176_00_goyo/7104_0701_01_10:
“Pokémon and people supplied each other with
goods and supported each other.”
ch0176_00_goyo/7104_0701_02_10:
That’s a line from a book about the Sinnoh
region’s mythology.
ch0176_00_goyo/7104_0701_03_10:
Apparently there have been close bonds similar to
those of sync pairs since long ago.
ch0176_00_goyo/7105_0701_01_10:
I’ve been meaning to tell you
something, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0176_00_goyo/7105_0701_02_10:
Try challenging those you’ve already battled again
and again. You may discover something new.
ch0176_00_goyo/7105_0701_03_10:
That’s something I learned while rereading all my
favorite books.
ch0176_00_goyo/1701_0701_01_10:
Ah, you timed your arrival well. I was just looking
for you.
ch0176_00_goyo/1701_0701_02_10: I’d like to give this to you. Please accept it.
ch0176_00_goyo/1701_0702_01_10:
No need to thank me. It’s a token of my gratitude
for always spurring me on.
ch0176_00_goyo/2501_0701_01_10:
Once, I was so wrapped up in a book that before
I realized it, I was on a strange new island.
ch0176_00_goyo/2501_0701_02_10:
I don’t mean the imaginary world of a novel.
This actually happened to me.
ch0176_00_goyo/2501_0702_01_10:
Novels are naturally diverting, but real life can be
just as interesting.
ch0176_00_goyo/2501_0702_02_10:
There’s so much excitement every day on Pasio
that I don’t think I could possibly get bored.
ch0176_00_goyo/2511_0701_01_10:
Do you know any
good books, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0176_00_goyo/2511_0701_02_10:
I’ve had so many new encounters since coming to
Pasio, I thought it was about time I tried a new
book as well.
ch0176_00_goyo/2511_0702_01_10:
The genre’s not important, but I’m in the mood for
an adventure story.
ch0176_00_goyo/2511_0702_02_10:
Perhaps I’ve been inspired by all your fun
exploring Pasio.
ch0176_00_goyo/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning. Let’s do our best to make this a
productive day.
ch0176_00_goyo/3003_0701_01_10:
Good afternoon. Do you have any good
book recommendations? I’ve just finished
the one I was reading.
ch0176_00_goyo/3005_0701_01_10:
I’ve found that reading a book at the end of the
day leads to more restful sleep. I hope you have
a good night.
